pullRequest.title: [Feature] Feature Overview for Exam Mode
pullRequest.bodyText:
Checklist

 I tested all changes and all related features with different users (student, tutor, instructor, admin) on the test server https://artemistest.ase.in.tum.de.
 Client: I documented the TypeScript code using JSDoc style.
 Client: I added multiple screenshots/screencasts of my UI changes
 Client: I translated all the newly inserted strings into German and English

Motivation and Context
We want to create a page which displays the features of the exam mode in a clear way.
We also made some changes to the exam end page to reduce the clutter.
Description

Create the general structure of the view.
Create different routes for students and instructors.
Lazy load the features overview module
Create a pre-configured structure for texts including 1 text, 1 image, 2 texts, 2 images, centre text, first image left, first image right
Add the features displayed in:


https://confluence.ase.in.tum.de/display/ArTEMiS/Feature+Overview+German
https://confluence.ase.in.tum.de/display/ArTEMiS/Feature+Overview+English


Add the text for each feature
Add the screenshots where relevant

Coverage
feature-overview.component.ts 67.5%
Steps for Testing

nagivate to /#/features/instructors
navigate to /#/features/students
When you hover over a feature, more information is displayed.
When you press on a feature you should automatically scroll to the feature details.

Screenshots

commit.message: add different sections, add scrolling feature
add different configurations for the feature contents
incorperate screenshots into the instructor page
integrate images into student informative marketing
Merge branch 'feature/informative-marketing' of github.com:ls1intum/Artemis into feature/informative-marketing

Rename component to feature-overview.
Lazy load the component

replace text with improved version from confluence:
https://confluence.ase.in.tum.de/display/ArTEMiS/Feature+Overview+Page
Including text feedback from Confluence page
rewrite the texts according to new feedback
rework screenshots to not include samples and test. Do not use real users, use generic names

Add ability set first image as shrinked or expanded
Change duplicated icon

nodes.bodyText: please load those images from the Artemis server and NOT from the Github URL!

commit.message: load images from server not from github

nodes.bodyText: A third assessor, other than the original assessor will then be able to re-assess... Something is off here. Either other than the original assessors - plural, because there have to be two before a third comes, or A second assessor, ....

Not really an issue but more a matter of taste, I'd rewrite No stable internet connection? Not an issue. All changes made by the students are saved locally and automatically synced every 30 seconds. as All changes made by the students are saved locally and automatically synced every 30 seconds to avoid issues with instable internet connections. which sounds more formal to me. You can keep it as is if you think it is better.
Furthermore, You can preset... => Furthermore, you can preset...

Add an unlimited amount of exercises from most Artemis exercise types.: I'm not sure what that is supposed to mean. "most"? Imo this would read better as Create an unlimited amount of exercises from Artemis' default exercise types. (I assume that is what was meant here.)

students decide between working with the integrated code editor or can clone the repository and work on the exercise on their IDE of choice => students decide between working with the integrated code editor and cloning the repository, working on the exercise on their IDE of choice
Wait, I think it is better if we host this ourselves! Don't we have FA included already?
Do we need to load external fonts? What about using the same font setup as elsewhere?

commit.message:
Add features: offline mode for students, review individual exams for instructors.
Make LRZ login only visible for tum accounts.
Rework exam end screen to reduce clutter
Merge branch 'feature/informative-marketing' of github.com:ls1intum/Artemis into feature/informative-marketing
remove imported font and icons, apply text feedback
Merge branch 'feature/informative-marketing' of github.com:ls1intum/Artemis into feature/informative-marketing
Merge branch 'feature/informative-marketing' of github.com:ls1intum/Artemis into feature/informative-marketing
